query: LOAD CSV WITH HEADERS FROM 'https://www.dropbox.com/s/ci3cjwy91dp3a7e/movies_setup.csv?dl=0' AS row MERGE (m:Movie {title:row.title}) ON CREATE SET m.released = toInt(row.released), m.tagline = row.tagline  MERGE (p:Person  {name:row.name}) ON CREATE SET p.born     = toInt(row.born) WITH   m,p,row WHERE row.type = 'ACTED_IN' MERGE (p)-[r:ACTED_IN]->(m) ON CREATE SET r.roles = split(row.roles,';')[0..-1]
